name: vscode-codeaction-ui-sample
description: Sample to demonstrate code actions with UI
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.webpack: npm run clean && npm run antlr4 && webpack --mode production --config ./client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode production --config ./server/webpack.config.js
scripts.webpack:dev: npm run clean && npm run antlr4 && webpack --mode none --config ./client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode none --config ./server/webpack.config.js
scripts.antlr4: npm run antlr4:lexer && npm run antlr4:parser
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.clean: rimraf client/out && rimraf server/out && rimraf server/src/layerfile-service/antlr
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
